Package magellan.client.swing.map

Class RegionImageCellRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.client.swing.map.HexCellRenderer
      • magellan.client.swing.map.ImageCellRenderer
        • magellan.client.swing.map.RegionImageCellRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextChangeable, MapCellRenderer, MapperAware
    public class RegionImageCellRenderer
extends ImageCellRenderer
implements ContextChangeable, MapperAware
    This renderer writes an image per region onto the screen.
